sentences.sContent: My behavior is on behalf of half zebras," the algebra teacher said.
sentences.sContent_eng: My behavior is on behalf of half zebras," the algebra teacher said.
sentences.sCn: "我的行为代表了一半斑马的利益,"代数老师说.

sentences.sContent: I barely passed algebra and geometry， but here she's head of her class in both.
sentences.sContent_eng: I barely passed algebra and geometry， but here she's head of her class in both.
sentences.sCn: 我的几何和代数只是勉强及格。 可是，她这两门课在班里都是第一。

words.tran: [数] 代数的；关于代数学的

trans.tranOther: a type of mathematics that uses letters and other signs to represent numbers and values
